thread.title: Christine Knickle
thread.title_full: Eyes of India reviewed by Christine Knickle

author: Christine Knickle
title: Christine Knickle
text: I purchased cushion covers from Eyes of India for my new house because I loved the colours and size options offered. I had to wait a bit for them to arrive but well worth the wait once I opened the package to see and feel the quality of their thoughtful artwork. My cushions came to life on my couch and every time I walk into my living room, they bring me such joy! Thank you for your wonderful creations!
